attributes.action: Hold a public referendum on whether to sign the WHO pandemic treaty
attributes.additional_details: We believe that the WHO pandemic treaty is a dangerous threat to our sovereignty.
attributes.background: We think the government should hold a public referendum to allow us to vote on whether to sign the WHO pandemic treaty. We do not think that this is a decision for the government to make without public input.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
